Label: K0 - ACE SIS 1-Hour Key Parameters - E. C. Stone (California Institute of Technology)

VariableDescription.Name: H_lo
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     TITLE                           ACE> Solar Isotope Spectrometer Parameters
#     PROJECT                         ISTP>International Solar-Terrestrial Physics
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Interplanetary Studies
#     SOURCE_NAME                     AC>Advanced Composition Explorer
#     DATA_TYPE                       K0>1-Hr Key Parameter Data

#     LINK_TEXT                       Documentation for these
#     LINK_TITLE                      unverified ACE Browse Data
#     HTTP_LINK                       http://www.srl.caltech.edu/ACE/ASC/browse/view_browse_data.html
#     TEXT                            SIS - ACE Solar Isotope Spectrometer
#                                     References: http://www.srl.caltech.edu/ACE/
#                                     ACE browse data is designed for monitoring large scale particle and field
#                                     behavior and for selecting interesting time periods. The data is automatically
#                                     generated from the spacecraft data stream using simple algorithms provided by
#                                     the instrument teams. It is not routinely checked for accuracy and is subject
#                                     to revision. Use this data at your own risk, and consult with the appropriate
#                                     instrument teams about citing it.
#                                     SIS Browse data is not validated by the experimenters and should not be used
#                                     except for preliminary examination prior to detailed studies.
#     MODS                            Initial Release 04/10/99
#     ADID_REF                        NSSD0327
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 AC_K0_SIS_19970828_V04
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  ac_k0_sis
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      K0 - ACE SIS 1-Hour Key Parameters
#     PI_NAME                         E. C. Stone
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  California Institute of Technology
#     MISSION_GROUP                   ACE
#                                     !___Interplanetary Data near 1 AU
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Particles (space)
#     TIME_RESOLUTION                 1 hour
#     WEB_SITE                        http://www.srl.caltech.edu/ACE/ASC/browse/view_browse_data.html
#     ACKNOWLEDGEMENT                 The SIS Browse data are not citable. Contact the ACE
#                                     Science Center at:
#                                     http://www.srl.caltech.edu/ACE/ASC/ for verified data
#     RULES_OF_USE                    See the rules of use available from the ACE
#                                     Science Center at:
#                                     http://www.srl.caltech.edu/ACE/ASC/
#     ALT_LOGICAL_SOURCE              ACE_SIS_Ions>10-MeV-Key-Parameters-K0_1hour_cdf
#     CDFMAJOR                        COL_MAJOR
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Time, beginning of interval
#  2. Proton Flux (E>10 MeV)
#       NOTES:  Proton Flux E>10 MeV - During solar quiet times, these fluxes are contaminated by background from particles entering from the sides of the instrument.
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Mon May 16 10:14:14 2016
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#       NOTES:  Proton Flux E>10 MeV - During solar quiet times, these fluxes are contaminated by background from particles entering from the sides of the instrument.
#
EPOCH_TIME                     H_(>10_MEV)
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms  1/(cm2_s_ster_MeV)
28-08-1997 00:00:00.000            2.02882

VariableDescription.Name: CNO_lo

#                                     ACE browse data is designed for monitoring large scale particle and field
#                                     behavior and for selecting interesting time periods. The data is automatically
#                                     generated from the spacecraft data stream using simple algorithms provided by

#                                     to revision. Use this data at your own risk, and consult with the appropriate

#                                     except for preliminary examination prior to detailed studies.
#     MODS                            Initial Release 04/10/99

#     PI_NAME                         E. C. Stone
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  California Institute of Technology
#     MISSION_GROUP                   ACE
#                                     !___Interplanetary Data near 1 AU
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Particles (space)

#
#  1. Time, beginning of interval
#  2. CNO Flux (7-10 MeV/n)
#       NOTES:  Note that the energy intervals for the most abundant elements C, N, and O all differ somewhat from the nominal values of 7 to 10 MeV/nuc.

#

28-08-1997 00:00:00.000          8.57013E-06

#     MISSION_GROUP                   ACE

#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Particles (space)

#

dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms  1/(cm2_s_ster_MeV/n)
28-08-1997 00:00:00.000          4.36591E-06

VariableDescription.Name: Z_ge_10
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************

#     PROJECT                         ISTP>International Solar-Terrestrial Physics
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Interplanetary Studies

#     HTTP_LINK                       http://www.srl.caltech.edu/ACE/ASC/browse/view_browse_data.html
#     TEXT                            SIS - ACE Solar Isotope Spectrometer
#                                     References: http://www.srl.caltech.edu/ACE/
#                                     ACE browse data is designed for monitoring large scale particle and field
#                                     behavior and for selecting interesting time periods. The data is automatically
#                                     generated from the spacecraft data stream using simple algorithms provided by
#                                     the instrument teams. It is not routinely checked for accuracy and is subject
#                                     to revision. Use this data at your own risk, and consult with the appropriate
#                                     instrument teams about citing it.
#                                     SIS Browse data is not validated by the experimenters and should not be used
#                                     except for preliminary examination prior to detailed studies.
#     MODS                            Initial Release 04/10/99
#     ADID_REF                        NSSD0327
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 AC_K0_SIS_19970828_V04
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  ac_k0_sis
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      K0 - ACE SIS 1-Hour Key Parameters
#     PI_NAME                         E. C. Stone
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  California Institute of Technology
#     MISSION_GROUP                   ACE
#                                     !___Interplanetary Data near 1 AU
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Particles (space)
#     TIME_RESOLUTION                 1 hour
#     WEB_SITE                        http://www.srl.caltech.edu/ACE/ASC/browse/view_browse_data.html
#     ACKNOWLEDGEMENT                 The SIS Browse data are not citable. Contact the ACE
#                                     Science Center at:
#                                     http://www.srl.caltech.edu/ACE/ASC/ for verified data
#     RULES_OF_USE                    See the rules of use available from the ACE
#                                     Science Center at:
#                                     http://www.srl.caltech.edu/ACE/ASC/
#     ALT_LOGICAL_SOURCE              ACE_SIS_Ions>10-MeV-Key-Parameters-K0_1hour_cdf
#     CDFMAJOR                        COL_MAJOR
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Time, beginning of interval
#  2. Z>=10 flux (9-21 MeV/n)
#       NOTES:  Note that the quoted energy interval of ~9 to 21 MeV/nuc is strictly valid only for Si. For Ne the corresponding interval is ~8 to ~17 MeV/nuc, while for Fe it is ~12 to ~26 MeV/nuc.
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Mon May 16 10:14:15 2016
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#       NOTES:  Note that the quoted energy interval of ~9 to 21 MeV/nuc is strictly valid only for Si. For Ne the corresponding interval is ~8 to ~17 MeV/nuc, while for Fe it is ~12 to ~26 MeV/nuc.
#
EPOCH_TIME                Z>=10_(9-21_MEV/N)
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms  1/(cm2_s_ster_MeV/n)
28-08-1997 00:00:00.000          6.42760E-07
